active.title: ALPHA BS SOCCER LEAGUE S2
active.quote: "Power isn't determined by ability. It's determined by the will to use it." â€“ Madara Uchiha
active.description: Showcase your amazing soccer skills in Bombsquad and determine who is the best soccer team! The wait has been too long and finally it's here now!
active.tournamentDetailsHtml:
Tournament Format

  • All matches will be in epic mode
  • All matches will be in trio mode (3v3)
  • All matches will be with gloves
  • All matches will be a single series, best of 3 soccer rounds
  • All matches will be live streamed in Alpha Community

archived.title: ALPHA BS SOCCER LEAGUE S1
archived.quote: "Champions keep playing until they get it right." â€“ Billie Jean King
archived.description: Our inaugural season brought the community together for an unforgettable showdown.
archived.tournamentDetailsHtml:
Tournament Format

  • All matches were in epic mode
  • All matches were in trio mode (3v3)
  • Best of 3 soccer rounds
  • All matches were streamed live

Tournament Highlights

Season 1 featured 16 teams and a packed finals weekend with record viewers.
